square.obstacle

Class MultiObstacle

  • java.lang.Object
    • square.MultiSquare
      • square.obstacle.MultiObstacle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Obstacle
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LightTrail, Wall

    public abstract class MultiObstacle
extends MultiSquare
implements Obstacle
    Super class where any obstacle covering multiple squares inherits its general properties from. Such as a wall or a light trail A player cannot move through an obstacle.
    Author:
    Dieter Castel, Jonas Devlieghere, Vincent Reniers and Stefan Pante

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MultiObstacle()
      Create a new MultiObstacle

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSquare(Square square)
      Adds a square to this MultiSquare
      protected boolean squaresPointBack()
      Since a multiObstacle is implemented bi-directionally this method should always hold which means every square points back to it's proper obstacle.

        contains, equals, getLength, getSquares, hashCode, isValidSquare, removeSquare
